meanings.sent1: The catjangs in the garden are growing well.
meanings.sent2: I planted some catjangs in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The catjangs seemed to be chatting with the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The catjangs stood tall like little green soldiers in the soil.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the catjangs caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: the seeds of the catjang plant
meanings.sent1: I collected some catjangs to plant next season.
meanings.sent2: The catjangs were carefully stored for future planting.
meanings.sent3: The catjangs rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The catjangs were like tiny treasures waiting to be sown.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly harvested catjangs filled the room.

meanings.definition: to plant catjang beans in the garden
meanings.sent1: I will catjangs the beans tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She catjangs the seeds every spring.
meanings.sent3: Let's catjangs the catjang beans and see them grow!
meanings.sent4: He catjangs the garden with care and patience.
meanings.sent5: They catjangs the catjang beans in neat rows for easy harvesting.
